channel.title: Mining animations do not work

item.title: Mining animations do not work
item.dc:creator: @openice123 openice123
item.description:
@openice123 wrote:

im trying to use a loop for the animations to find the pickaxes but it isnt working out quite well
any ideas
any suggestions
any errors?

int

public int pickAxe[] = { 1265, 1267, 1269, 1273, 1271, 1275 };

loop

for(int i = 0; i <= pickAxe.length; i++) { doPickAxeAnimation(c, i); }

method

[code] public void doPickAxeAnimation(client c, int item)
{
int animationID = -1;

	switch(item)
	{
		case 1265: // bronze pick
		animationID = 625;
		break;

		case 1267:
		animationID = 626; // iron
		break;

		case 1269:
		animationID = 627; // steel
		break;

		case 1273:
		animationID = 629; // mith
		break;

		case 1271:
		animationID = 628; // addy
		break;

		case 1275:
		animationID = 624; // rune
		break;
	}

	c.setAnimation(animationID);
}

[/code]

Read full topic
